snippet: We have been waiting for some days for the official announcement of the dismissal by our Government of its present Consul at Havana. Action in such a case ought not to be taken, certainly, in undue haste, or without a sufficient knowledge of the c...
lead_paragraph: We have been waiting for some days for the official announcement of the dismissal by our Government of its present Consul at Havana. Action in such a case ought not to be taken, certainly, in undue haste, or without a sufficient knowledge of the circumstances of the case.
